channel.title: genetics on Nurfatima Jandarova
channel.description: Recent content in genetics on Nurfatima Jandarova

item.title: Genetics side effects: curious things I learned trying to fix data issues
item.description: Randomization is in the blood of all female species (human or not). Despite having two types of X chromosomes, every cell shuts down one of them randomly. This is the reason some female cats can have patchy fur and some women have patches of skin unable to sweat.
